Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Freeholdnj "Mommy"
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome!  I do not have a data plan I have pay as you go (don't need to be "connected" continuously to the internet). Texting is great with the qwerty keyboard. I just want a phone that texts and calls and is small in size to fit in my pocket.  This phone also makes calls over Wifi so when I don't get a mobile signal if I'm traveling, I connect it to my Myfi.  I can't set up the email account since I don't have data but who cares!  I check my emails on my computer anyway.

Reviews.Title: Not as Expected.  Keys are too small and hard to use
Reviews.Author: alan farber
Reviews.Content: keys are small and hard to use but I like the phone overall.  It can fit into my back pocket easily

Reviews.Title: Wish it had active sync!
Reviews.Author: AJK
Reviews.Content: Only used it a few months when we updated our outlook server at work.  Oh well.  Worked great until then.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Yejiang
Reviews.Content: FIRST OF ALL, I BELIEVE IT IS NOT SELLER'S FAULT.I GOT MY BLACKBERRY TODAY, AND I COULDN'T LOGIN TO BLACKBERRY ID, COULDN'T UPDATE BLACKBERRY WORLD WITH BOTH MY PHONE AND MY COMPUTER. WHEN I TRIED TO UPDATE MY BLACKBERRY WORLD IT SHOWS 'MODE NOT AVAILABLE'. WHEN I TRIED TO LOOK UP WHY I CAN'T LOGIN TO MY BLACKBERRY ID IT ONLY SAID 'HAVE TO TRY AGAIN' WITHOUT GIVING ANY USEFUL SOLUTION. I MEAN, WHY DON'T BLACKBERRY MAKE SURE EVERYTHING GOES WELL WITH THIS MODE BEFORE SELLING IT????I CAN'T BELIEVE I SPENT $160+ AND ENDED UP GOT A PIECE OF TRASH.UPDATE: After wasting one whole afternoon trying to fix it, I almost gave up and decided to return it. I removed the battery and put both the phone and the battery to the box so that I can return. Then I realized I just can't afford more time choosing another cell phone. I put the battery back and tried to give it another chance. After that it worked. I did try to restart it before deciding to return it, but never took the battery out.The only reason I'm still keeping this phone is I can't afford wasting more time choosing another phone, that's it.
